basic_information.scholarship_name: Barbara and George Rigler Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Barbara and George Rigler Endowed Scholarsh
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education Professional Studies who are majoring in degree in the Dr. Virginia Peters Kinesiology and Health Studies Department. Eligibility Requirements Student must be a declared major within the Dr. Virginia Peters Kinesiology and Health Studies Department Must demonstrate financial need Preference will be given to applicants who are UCO football and volleyball student athletes Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
